703592f-a.text:
Clarkson Avenue, north side, between Albany and New York Avenues, showing W. P. A. workmen working on one of the buildings of Eings County Hospital, as part of a large construction project being conducted here by the federal agency.
June 6, 1936
Federal Art Project--W. P. A.
Photographic Division
703592f-a.folder: Clarkson Avenue & Albany Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

703593f.text:
Clarkson Avenue, north side, between Albany and Sew York Avenues. Shown are units of Kings County Hospital, one of them under construction by W. P. A. workmen (left). The landscaping, too, is being done by W. P. A. laborers.
January 11, 1937
Works Progress Administration
City wide Project

703598f-a.text:
